original_text: These were the men who came to David at Ziklag, while he was banished from the presence of Saul son of Kish (they were among the warriors who helped him in battle;
korean_text: 다윗이 기스의 아들 사울로 말미암아 시글락에 숨어 있을 때에 그에게 와서 싸움을 도운 용사 중에 든 자가 있었으니

sentences.original_text: These were the men who came to David at Ziklag
while he was banished from the presence of Saul son of Kish
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 기스의 아들 사울 앞에서 쫓겨나 있을 때였고

sentences.original_text: they were among the warriors who helped him in battle
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 전투에서 그를 도왔던 용사들 중에 있었습니다
